languages.text: "Имена техноэкипажа, несшего службу на пораженном порчей судне, вычеркнуты из поминальной свод-молитвы. Ввиду постыдного непротивления скверне им отказано в статусе страстотерпцев".
"The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."
languages.original_text: "Имена техноэкипажа, несшего службу на пораженном порчей судне, вычеркнуты из поминальной свод-молитвы. Ввиду постыдного непротивления скверне им отказано в статусе страстотерпцев".

traits.locale_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from the memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."
"The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from the memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."
"The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from the memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."
"The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from the memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

languages.text: “那艘失事船上服役的所有技术人员，名字都已经从纪念祷告代码中移除。考虑到他们可耻地听从混沌摆布，本单位已经剥夺了他们的烈士身份。”
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: “那艘失事船上服役的所有技术人员，名字都已经从纪念祷告代码中移除。考虑到他们可耻地听从混沌摆布，本单位已经剥夺了他们的烈士身份。”

languages.text: « Les noms des membres du tech-équipage ayant servi sur le vaisseau frappé par la corruption ont été rayés du registre des prières. Le statut de martyr ne leur sera pas accordé en raison de leur non-résistance à la souillure. »
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: « Les noms des membres du tech-équipage ayant servi sur le vaisseau frappé par la corruption ont été rayés du registre des prières. Le statut de martyr ne leur sera pas accordé en raison de leur non-résistance à la souillure. »

languages.text: «Los nombres del personal tecnológico asignado a la nave asolada por la plaga han sido borrados del código de oración funeraria. A la vista de su lamentable falta de resistencia a la profanación, se les niega el estatus de mártir».
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: «Los nombres del personal tecnológico asignado a la nave asolada por la plaga han sido borrados del código de oración funeraria. A la vista de su lamentable falta de resistencia a la profanación, se les niega el estatus de mártir».

languages.text: 「損傷したシップで勤務していた技術員の名は追悼コードから削除されている。汚染に無抵抗だったという恥ずべき行為を考慮し、殉教者扱いはしない」
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: 「損傷したシップで勤務していた技術員の名は追悼コードから削除されている。汚染に無抵抗だったという恥ずべき行為を考慮し、殉教者扱いはしない」

languages.text: "Die Namen der Tech-Crew, die auf dem verseuchten Schiff gedient haben, wurden aus dem Gedenkgebetscode gelöscht. Angesichts ihres schändlichen Nicht-Widerstands gegen die Schändung wird ihnen der Märtyrerstatus verwehrt."
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: "Die Namen der Tech-Crew, die auf dem verseuchten Schiff gedient haben, wurden aus dem Gedenkgebetscode gelöscht. Angesichts ihres schändlichen Nicht-Widerstands gegen die Schändung wird ihnen der Märtyrerstatus verwehrt."

languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from the memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

languages.text: "Hastalık vurmuş gemide görevli tekno mürettebatın isimleri, anma duası kodundan silinmiştir. Lekelenmeye karşı verdikleri utanç verici direniş göz önüne alınarak şehitlik mertebesinin verilmesi reddedilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "The names of the tech-crew who served on the blight-stricken ship have been deleted from memorial prayer code. In view of their shameful non-resistance to defilement, martyr status is denied."

traits.locale_text: "Hastalık vurmuş gemide görevli tekno mürettebatın isimleri, anma duası kodundan silinmiştir. Lekelenmeye karşı verdikleri utanç verici direniş göz önüne alınarak şehitlik mertebesinin verilmesi reddedilmiştir."
